title: Progressive Cactus parameters
description: Parameter specifications for generating a Progressive Cactus via the CPU docker on AWS EC2

genomesDir.description: AWS path to location of pre-uploaded input assemblies relative to default remote prefix (assumed to be salk-tm-dev/heidi/data1/hechen/MUsoyGenomes

hubDir.description: AWS path to location of output dir for assembly hub files relative to default remote prefix (assumed to be salk-tm-dev/heidi/data1/hechen/MUsoyGenomes

tree.description: tree used to guide cactus construction

genomes.description: dictionary/object mapping assembly abbreviations to assembly file names (basenames only, e.g. Gmax_MU-041.v1.softmasked.fa.gz)
